d2_dictionary.object_name: DQL - General - All applicable countries for template
d2_dictionary.title: Used for regional template scoping.
d2_dictionary.application_names: OpenText Life Sciences eTMF Solution¬OpenText Life Sciences Medical Device for Quality and Manufacturing Solution¬OpenText Life Sciences Medical Device for Research and Development Solution¬OpenText Life Sciences Medical Device Solution¬OpenText Life Sciences Quality and Manufacturing Solution¬OpenText Life Sciences Research and Development Solution¬OpenText Life Sciences Submission Storage and Viewing
d2_dictionary.dql: select d1.dictionary_key as name, d1.locale_value as label_en from dm_dbo.d2_dictionary_locale_view d1, dm_dbo.d2_dictionary_alias_view d2 where d1.dictionary_name = 'Submission Country' and d2.dictionary_name = d1.dictionary_name and d2.dictionary_key = d1.dictionary_key and d2.alias_name = 'Region' and d2.alias_value in ($repeatingvalue(applicable_region_codes)) and d1.locale_name = 'en' order by 2
